name: hotel_miranda
description: In this sprint, your task is to create the layout of the website that users will access to obtain information and/or make reservations at Hotel Miranda.

scripts.deploy: aws s3 sync build/ s3://hotelmiranda --delete --profile sirallap
scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cp -r index.html aboutUs.html contact.html offers.html room-details.html rooms.html styles index.js assets build
